definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Walnut is a local specialty here.
Here is a local speciality from China.
sentences.chinese: 這是我從中國帶來的土特產。

sentences.english: Mr. Amderson on behalf of our bureau, I'd like to present you with a special-local product.
sentences.chinese: 安德遜先生，我謹代表我局送你一件土特產。

sentences.english: The Jinsi jujube is one of native product in the Cangzhou Area in Hebei Province.
sentences.chinese: 金絲小棗是滄州地區土特產品之一，馳名中外。

sentences.english: In addition, there are abundant animal native products, the development potential is great.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還有豐富的農畜土特產品，開發潛力比較大。
這家商店出售土特產品。

sentences.english: Our company is committed to the goal of China's best tou .
sentences.chinese: 我們公司的目標是致力於做中國最好的土特產品。

sentences.english: In addition, the shiitake mushroom is also our country tradition exports the local product.
sentences.chinese: 此外，香菇也是我國傳統的出口土特產。

definition: merchandise sold for Chinese New Year
virtually the same/differing only on small points
at the Chinese New Year or other festivities
